articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.title: A fake press release claiming Kroger accepts crypto reached the retailer’s own webpage
articles.description: A crypto hoax claimed Kroger is accepting Bitcoin Cash. The fake press release was similar to one targeting Walmart earlier this year. The retailer quickly confirmed it’s fake, but not before the cryptocurrency’s price spiked by $30.
articles.content:
A similar hoax earlier this year tied Walmart to Litecoin

articles.title: Bitcoin Miners Are Gobbling Up U.S. Energy
articles.description: There’s a big new presence slurping up power from the U.S. grid, and it’s growing: bitcoin miners. New research shows that the U.S. has overtaken China as the top global destination for bitcoin mining and energy use is skyrocketing as a result.Read more...
